documents.document: RT @northvanrun: You know what to do! Sign kids up for 1K at North Van Run and let them fly! Itâ€™s free for kids 13 and under. https://t.coâ€¦

Happy Canada Day ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡¦ ! Had a great day on the trails & of course I took my AfterShokz with me so I can have some tunes. I loved being able to talk to mountain bikers along the way without taking off my headphones. Hereâ€™s how the rest of the trail run... https://t.co/TXl9IH0nff

Itâ€™s @westvanrun crewâ€™s 3rd birthday! Come celebrate with us this weekend with a run and some ðŸ° - 9:30 at John Lawson Park. All are welcome, just RSVP on the FB event. See you there #westvanrun #westvancouver #vancouver #runvan #runclub https://t.co/VtK5jnYhUn https://t.co/8uMw6xbFkW

Went to my very first @parkrunCA & volunteered as a photographer. Such a blast to be a part of this welcoming grassroots event. Check out the rest of the photos here. #bibchat #parkrun #sportsphotography #runningphotos https://t.co/6VAnDmcSVu https://t.co/IXMpUWAl48

Went for a quick run last night & kept the pace up with fast-paced music and my @AfterShokz - want one of your own? They are having a Canada Day giveaway this week. Enter by Friday to win! Good luck! #bibchat #aftershokzcabr https://t.co/0EaZLqqSdz https://t.co/aXftZUJhCJ

@BibRave A4 I talk about the experience with someone and then try to focus on the next task. I need to mope around and over-analyze what I did before I can move on so however long that takes ðŸ˜œ #bibchat
@BibRave A3 Alternating hard and easy days is a must for me. I also incorporate a strength workout and just do a short, easy run as a warmup. #bibchat
@mhaarhues @BibRave @oofos It feels great after a hard workout. #bibchat
@BibRave A2 I wear my @oofos of course, and also soak in an epsom salt bath #bibchat
@BibRave A1 Quads and calves... thank you trail running! ðŸ˜œ #bibchat
@BibRave Hi itâ€™s Jeannine from Vancouver! Hard to choose an all-time favourite but I love many Tarantino films. #bibchat https://t.co/u8MUiEDSMY

Will be trading in the Baden Powell for the technical trails in #Squamish this weekend. @cuski78 will be doing his first ultra @Squamish50 50k & I will be half crazy & tackling the 23k. Looking forward to our first #SQ50 experience! #bibchat #trailrunning https://t.co/6lPSXdlEVm

Less than a week until Squamish50 and we are feeling so many emotions. Trainingâ€™s done, we just have to trust our feet, minds and bodies to crush this difficult race (made even more difficult with the expected... https://t.co/nUoYyOrqKw
@amandaklee206 Pearl Jam, Nirvana, Soundgarden, Jimi Hendrix

Happy BC Day! Where is this long weekend taking you? I spent time in the trails on Saturday and Sunday so today is reserved for some rest. Less than 2 weeks until Squamish50 23K! Who else will be there?
Exploring new trails & having beers with @cuski78 & @IslandSoapBox - missing @CTVScottHurst ðŸ˜œ#trailrunning #sasamatlake #runwild #5peaksrun https://t.co/pftIqEX0yb
RT @PennyDaflos: Hereâ€™s the story â€” and I promise itâ€™ll make you smile! Lucas is a smart and charming little dude with a very bright futureâ€¦
@cuski78 @indy_chris Quit your whining ðŸ˜œ
@BibRave A6 Yes! I've volunteered at a bunch of races. I try to do it as often as I can. #bibchat
@BibRave A5 New friendships, being in the best shape of my life (and getting better), and the ability to conquer challenges I never would've dreamed of doing. #bibchat
@BibRave It's the peer pressure and not wanting to have to explain why you didn't make that goal. That's what it is for me anyway lol #bibchat
@tmurph135 @BibRave and thank you â˜ºï¸I try to make my photos look good.
@tmurph135 @BibRave haha the PNW is just so hard to take a bad photo of @tmurph135 #bibchat
@BibRave A4 I wish I had a better system but I blog about my goals. Telling people about my goals gives me more motivation to achieve them. #bibchat
@BibRave A3 Nothing aside from eating a safe, tried and tested breakfast ðŸ˜œ #bibchat
@BibRave A2 Comfort and style... It should feel like it's just a part of me and also has to look good. #bibchat
@BibRave A1 Just my everyday necklace or stud earrings... mostly because I'm coming from work when I run #bibchat
@BibRave Hi! Jeannine from Vancouver here. Favourite way to relax is just lying on the couch or an epsom salt bath. #bibchat https://t.co/aebciHk8bB
RT @northvanrun: Today is the day! Get registered before the price increase at 11:59 PM tonight! https://t.co/MP9S931G4o https://t.co/Bks6Mâ€¦

The new @northvanrun medals look great! I can't wait to wear the 10K one. Register by July 31st to get the lower rates & use code JEANNINE for an extra discount! Looking forward to Sept 30 #northvanrun #wvrc #westvanrun #running #northvancouver https://t.co/If9T22ZlPq https://t.co/bT2kU4JXef

Sunday was spent on the Seymour trails with @cuski78 - it was a hot one, even in the shade. It felt great to get out though! #bibchat #runwild #trailcrewleader #5peaks #trailcrew https://t.co/9k9YoixhSJ

This weekend was busy and hot! Saturday was spent helping runners crush their goals at @CoastMtnTrail #buckinhell Seymour Aid Station. 2nd year in a row volunteering for this event & there will likely be a third. #trailrunning #volunteer https://t.co/wNYm2ss1kg
Congrats @CTVScottHurst and @IslandSoapBox for crushing the @CoastMtnTrail #BuckinHell relay today in this heat! #teamctv #ctvvancouver https://t.co/0YjQcxBVWt

I look forward to one last training run in Squamish before @Squamish50 23k in just a few short weeks. Getting nervous and excited at the same time. Here's my last #Squamish adventure on Canada Day. #trailrunning #bibchat #training https://t.co/8fnfAKCEuh https://t.co/fUWUVpXnfC

How was your sunny weekend? Spent Saturday with a lot of speedy people at Summerfast and then recovered on Sunday. Summerfast blog to come. Hope your weekend was as good as mine!

The Grand Finale of the @5PeaksRun BC series is on Sept 29. Have you signed up yet? The Sport course is a great intro for beginners & the Enduro is going to challenge the advanced runners. Register here and enjoy beautiful Buntzen Lake #trailrunning https://t.co/AFQUeqgcQp

Have you registered for 5 Peaks Trail Running Buntzen Lake yet? This is a great intro to trail running with a non-technical Sport course but if youâ€™re a little more advanced then the longer Enduro course will kick your butt. Sign up for the last 5... https://t.co/lbhUVpj0AA

I created a new Instagram account for just my cyclocross photos. As #crossishere I figured it's time to showcase and celebrate this crazy niche sport. Follow here or if you want running photos, follow @jeannineavelino ðŸ˜€ Or follow both! https://t.co/ao3mfB3gYW
